Fault.name: BPEL/JMSResponderProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpel:process> "JMSResponderProcess" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.

Fault.name: BPEL/JMSResponderProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "client:JMSResponderProcessRequestMessage" is resolvable (check imports, value of "messageType").
Fault.msg: "messageType" is set to "client:JMSResponderProcessRequestMessage" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "messageType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).
